doc:
Rebecca Schaeffer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebecca_Schaeffer 0 Rebecca Lucile Schaeffer (November 6, 1967 – July 18, 1989) was an American model and actress. Schaeffer began her career as a teen model before moving on to acting. In 1986, she landed the role of Patricia "Patti" Russell in the CBS sitcom My Sister Sam. After the series was canceled in 1988, Schaeffer appeared in several films, including the black comedy, Scenes from the Class Struggle in Beverly Hills, which was released six weeks before her death. Rebecca_Lucile_Schaeffer ( November_6_,_1967 – July_18_,_1989 ) was an_American_model_and_actress . Schaeffer began her_career as a_teen_model before moving on to acting . In 1986 , she landed the_role of Patricia_"_Patti_"_Russell in the_CBS_sitcom My_Sister_Sam . After the_series was_canceled in 1988 , Schaeffer appeared in several_films , including the_black_comedy , Scenes from the_Class_Struggle in Beverly_Hills , which was_released six_weeks before her_death .
